title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Executive Management and Organizational Learning: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: The relationship between the role of executive managers and organizational learning can be explained through a literature analysis
Cases of knowledge sharing and cultural change within organizations through Project-Based Learning (PBL) can be analyzed
Formative assessments can evaluate the impact of dialogue, power dynamics, and knowledge creation in the organizational learning process
